mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, email, phone, nickname, password, register_date, role) VALUES (#{memberId}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{nickname}, #{password}, NOW(), #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT member_id AS memberId, email, phone, nickname, password, role, register_date AS registerDate FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
SELECT member_id AS memberId, email, phone, nickname, password, role, register_date AS registerDate FROM member WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET password = #{newPassword} WHERE member_id = #{memberId}
